title: Legendrian Non-simple Whitehead Doubles Of The Trefoil
summary: Ozsváth and Stipsicz showed that some Eliashberg-Chekanov twist knots, which are Whitehead doubles of the unknot, are not Legendrian simple. We extend their result by considering some Whitehead doubles of the trefoil: Using properties of knot Floer homology and the distinguished surgery triangle, we show that this family of knots is Legendrian non-simple in the standard contact 3-sphere.

AI.tldr: 本文扩展了Ozsváth和Stipsicz的结果，证明某些三叶结的Whitehead加倍在标准接触3-球面中不是Legendrian简单的。
AI.motivation: 先前研究已发现某些unknot的Whitehead加倍（Eliashberg-Chekanov twist knots）不是Legendrian简单的。本文旨在将此结果扩展到更复杂的结类型，特别是三叶结的Whitehead加倍，以探索Legendrian非简单性在更广泛结族中的存在。
AI.method: 使用结Floer同调的性质和distinguished surgery triangle技术。通过分析这些代数拓扑工具，研究Whitehead加倍三叶结的Legendrian分类问题。
AI.result: 证明了三叶结的某些Whitehead加倍在标准接触3-球面中是Legendrian非简单的，即存在多个Legendrian同痕类但具有相同经典不变量。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将Legendrian非简单性的已知结果从unknot的Whitehead加倍扩展到三叶结的Whitehead加倍，表明Legendrian非简单性在更广泛的结族中出现，并展示了结Floer同调在Legendrian分类问题中的有效性。

title: Remarks on Fixed Point Assertions in Digital Topology, 11
comment: Some material is copied or paraphrased, with sources given
summary: The topic of fixed points in digital metric spaces has drawn yet more publications with assertions that are incorrect, incorrectly proven, trivial, or incoherently stated. We discuss publications with bad assertions concerning fixed points of self-functions on digital images, as in some of our previous papers.

AI.tldr: 论文批评数字度量空间中固定点相关研究的错误、平凡或表述不清的断言
AI.motivation: 针对数字度量空间中固定点研究领域存在大量错误、平凡或表述不清的出版物，作者旨在批判性地分析这些有问题的断言
AI.method: 通过讨论数字图像上自函数固定点的错误断言，延续作者先前论文的批判性分析方法
AI.result: 识别并指出了数字度量空间固定点研究中存在的错误证明、平凡结论和表述不清的问题
AI.conclusion: 数字度量空间固定点研究领域需要更严谨的数学论证和清晰的表述，以避免错误和误导性结论

title: Tiling Hyperbolic Manifolds: Algorithms and Applications
summary: We introduce a new tiling algorithm for hyperbolic 3-manifolds. We use it to compute the maximal cusp area matrix; this completely characterizes the space of all embedded and disjoint cusp neighborhoods. As another application of our work, we find the Epstein-Penner decomposition answering a challenge of Sakuma and Weeks. We furthermore provide the refinements needed to make our algorithm verified: producing intervals provably containing the correct answer. As key ingredient for our work and perhaps of independent interest, we give new and simpler expressions for the distances between points, lines, and planes in the hyperboloid model.

AI.tldr: 提出新的双曲3-流形铺砌算法，用于计算最大尖点面积矩阵，找到Epstein-Penner分解，并提供可验证的算法实现
AI.motivation: 需要一种算法来完全表征双曲3-流形中所有嵌入且不相交的尖点邻域空间，并解决Sakuma和Weeks提出的Epstein-Penner分解挑战
AI.method: 开发新的双曲3-流形铺砌算法，使用超双曲面模型中点、线和平面之间距离的新简化表达式作为关键工具
AI.result: 成功计算最大尖点面积矩阵，找到Epstein-Penner分解，并提供了可验证的算法实现，确保结果包含在证明正确的区间内
AI.conclusion: 新算法有效解决了双曲3-流形中的关键几何问题，提出的距离表达式简化了计算并可能具有独立的研究价值

title: Fundamental Theorems in the K-Theory of Gamma Semirings: Additivity, Localization, and Dévissage
summary: Building on the Waldhausen and Quillen models of higher algebraic $K$-theory for exact categories and Waldhausen categories attached to a non-commutative $n$-ary $\Ga$-semiring $(T,\Ga)$, we establish the fundamental formal properties of $K$-theory in this $\Ga$-parametrised, slot-sensitive setting. For the exact/Waldhausen categories of finitely generated bi-positional $n$-ary $\Ga$-modules, perfect complexes in the derived category, and perfect quasi-coherent complexes on the non-commutative $\Ga$-spectrum $\SpecGnC{T}$, we prove Waldhausen Fibration and Additivity theorems and Quillen-type Localization for Serre and Waldhausen pairs. Under natural hypotheses on $\Ga$-stable filtrations we obtain dévissage and Approximation theorems, together with cofinality and Karoubi invariance, showing that idempotent completion does not change $K$-theory and that cofinal subcategories control $K_n$ in positive degrees. We further derive a Bass--Quillen fundamental triangle for polynomial extensions in the $n$-ary $\Ga$-context and prove nilpotent invariance for two-sided $\Ga$-ideals. In geometric terms, these results yield localization and Mayer--Vietoris sequences for the $K$-theory of $\Perf(X)$ on $X=\SpecGnC{T}$ and its admissible open covers. Altogether, the paper shows that the higher $K$-theory of non-commutative $n$-ary $\Ga$-semirings enjoys the same formal properties as in the classical ring and scheme cases, providing a robust foundation for subsequent computational and homotopy-theoretic applications.

AI.tldr: 该论文将经典代数K理论推广到非交换n元Γ-半环，建立了相应的Waldhausen和Quillen模型，证明了包括纤维化、加性、局部化、dévissage、逼近等基本形式性质。
AI.motivation: 将经典代数K理论（针对交换环和概形）的形式性质推广到非交换n元Γ-半环的框架中，为后续计算和同伦论应用奠定基础。
AI.method: 基于Waldhausen和Quillen的模型，构建非交换n元Γ-半环(T,Γ)的精确范畴和Waldhausen范畴，研究有限生成双位置n元Γ-模、导出范畴中的完美复形、以及非交换Γ-谱Spec_Γ(T)上的完美拟凝聚复形等范畴的K理论。
AI.result: 证明了Waldhausen纤维化定理、加性定理、Quillen型局部化定理（针对Serre对和Waldhausen对），在Γ-稳定滤过条件下获得dévissage和逼近定理，以及余终性和Karoubi不变性，还推导了Bass-Quillen基本三角形和幂零不变性。
AI.conclusion: 非交换n元Γ-半环的高阶K理论具有与经典环和概形情形相同的良好形式性质，这为后续的计算和同伦论应用提供了坚实的基础。

title: On the Nonprojectedness of Supermoduli with Neveu-Schwarz and Ramond Punctures
summary: We study the supermoduli space $\mathfrak {M}_{g,n,2r}$ of Super Riemann Surfaces (SRS) of genus $g$, with $n$ Neveu-Schwarz punctures and $2r$ Ramond punctures. We improve the result of Donagi, Witten, and Ott by showing that the supermoduli space $\mathfrak M_{g,n,2r}$ is not projected if $g\geq n+5r+3$.

AI.tldr: 论文改进了Donagi、Witten和Ott的结果，证明了当g≥n+5r+3时，超黎曼曲面的超模空间不是投影的
AI.motivation: 研究具有n个Neveu-Schwarz穿刺点和2r个Ramond穿刺点的超黎曼曲面的超模空间，改进先前关于该空间投影性质的结果
AI.method: 通过数学分析和证明技术，建立了超模空间非投影性的充分条件
AI.result: 证明了当亏格g满足g≥n+5r+3时，超模空间𝔐_{g,n,2r}不是投影的
AI.conclusion: 该结果改进了Donagi、Witten和Ott的工作，为超黎曼曲面模空间的几何性质提供了更精确的描述

title: Separable rational connectedness and $k$-plane sections of hypersurfaces
summary: Let X be a smooth hypersurface of degree d in P^n over an algebraically closed field of characteristic p. We show that X must be separably rationally connected and must contain a free line if either p is at least d or if p is at least d-1 and the defining equation has some partial derivative that is not too singular. We also show that X must be separably rationally connected in any characteristic if d = 4 and n is sufficiently large. Along the way, we generalize results on the spaces of k-planes in X to characteristic p and connect some of these questions to the spaces of linear sections of X.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了特征p代数闭域上光滑超曲面的有理连通性，证明了在特定条件下超曲面必须是可分有理连通的，并且包含自由直线。
AI.motivation: 研究特征p代数闭域上光滑超曲面的几何性质，特别是其有理连通性和包含自由直线的条件，这是代数几何中的重要问题。
AI.method: 通过推广k-平面空间的结果到特征p情形，并将这些问题与超曲面的线性截面空间联系起来进行分析。
AI.result: 证明了当p≥d或p≥d-1且定义方程有不太奇异的偏导数时，超曲面必须是可分有理连通的且包含自由直线；当d=4且n足够大时，在任何特征下超曲面都必须是可分有理连通的。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了特征p代数闭域上光滑超曲面有理连通性的充分条件，推广了相关结果，并为理解这类代数簇的几何性质提供了新工具。

title: From affine algebraic racks to Leibniz algebras
summary: We introduce analogues of algebraic groups called algebraic racks, which are pointed rack objects in the category of schemes over a ground field. Addressing a problem of Loday, we construct a functor assigning a canonical Leibniz algebra to every affine algebraic rack. This functor recovers the Lie algebras of affine algebraic groups (via conjugation quandles) and the Leibniz algebras of algebraic Lie racks, and it is compatible with closed subracks and left ideals. We also compare properties of affine algebraic racks, commutative corack algebras, and their Leibniz algebras.

AI.tldr: 本文引入了代数rack的概念，作为代数群的类似物，并构造了从仿射代数rack到Leibniz代数的函子，解决了Loday提出的问题。
AI.motivation: 解决Loday提出的问题，为代数rack理论建立系统框架，将代数群的概念推广到更一般的代数结构（rack），并建立与Leibniz代数的联系。
AI.method: 引入代数rack作为scheme范畴中的pointed rack对象；构造从仿射代数rack到Leibniz代数的函子；通过共轭quandle恢复代数群的李代数；研究仿射代数rack、交换corack代数及其Leibniz代数的性质比较。
AI.result: 成功构造了从仿射代数rack到Leibniz代数的规范函子；该函子能够恢复仿射代数群（通过共轭quandle）的李代数和代数Lie rack的Leibniz代数；证明了函子与闭子rack和左理想的兼容性。
AI.conclusion: 代数rack为代数群提供了自然的推广，所构造的函子建立了代数rack与Leibniz代数之间的系统联系，为解决Loday问题提供了有效工具，并为相关结构的研究奠定了基础。

title: Tetragonal Canonical Curves
summary: We compute the Harder-Narasimhan Filtration of the normal bundle $N_{C/\mathbb{P}^{g-1}}$ where $C$ is a general tetragonal canonical curve of genus $g$.

AI.tldr: 计算一般四重典范曲线在射影空间中的法丛的Harder-Narasimhan滤过
AI.motivation: 研究代数曲线在射影空间中的几何性质，特别是四重典范曲线的法丛结构，这有助于理解曲线的模空间和向量丛的稳定性
AI.method: 使用代数几何方法，计算一般四重典范曲线C在射影空间P^{g-1}中的法丛N_{C/P^{g-1}}的Harder-Narasimhan滤过
AI.result: 得到了四重典范曲线法丛的具体Harder-Narasimhan滤过结构，揭示了该向量丛的稳定性性质
AI.conclusion: 一般四重典范曲线的法丛具有特定的Harder-Narasimhan滤过结构，这为研究这类曲线的几何性质提供了重要工具

title: Bubbling limits of non collapsing polarized K3 surfaces
summary: We give an explicit and complete description of bubbling limits of a non-collapsing limit of polarized K3 surfaces in terms of the period mapping. In particular, we show that bubbling limits only depend on algebro-geometric data of the given family. As a corollary, this gives an affirmative answer to a conjecture of de Borbon--Spotti and confirms that Odaka's algebro-geometric candidate gives genuine bubbling limits in K3 surfaces case.

AI.tldr: 本文给出了K3曲面非塌缩极限中气泡极限的显式完整描述，证明了气泡极限仅依赖于代数几何数据，并证实了de Borbon-Spotti猜想和Odaka候选极限的正确性。
AI.motivation: 研究K3曲面在非塌缩极限下的气泡极限行为，理解这些极限如何依赖于代数几何数据，并验证相关猜想。
AI.method: 通过周期映射给出显式和完整的描述，分析气泡极限与代数几何数据的关系。
AI.result: 证明了气泡极限完全由给定族的代数几何数据决定，为de Borbon-Spotti猜想提供了肯定答案，并确认Odaka的代数几何候选确实是K3曲面情况下的真正气泡极限。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了K3曲面气泡极限与代数几何数据的直接对应关系，解决了相关猜想，为理解K3曲面的极限行为提供了重要理论框架。

title: Yoga for Fourier--Mukai partnership
summary: We study the behavior of integral transforms under various forms of base change. In particular, we establish a yoga of local algebra and fibers to test for derived equivalences via integral transforms. This partially generalizes a result of Orlov to singular varieties and strengthens many results in the literature to arbitrary fields. Additionally, it provides new insight into fibrations and their singularities arising in more arithmetically flavored contexts (e.g.\ projective and flat schemes over a DVR).

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了积分变换在不同基变换下的行为，建立了局部代数和纤维的"瑜伽"来测试导出等价，推广了Orlov的结果到奇异簇，并将文献中的结果强化到任意域。
AI.motivation: 研究积分变换在基变换下的行为，为测试导出等价提供新方法，并将现有结果推广到更一般的代数几何和算术几何背景中。
AI.method: 建立局部代数和纤维的"瑜伽"理论，利用积分变换来测试导出等价，将方法扩展到奇异簇和任意域的情况。
AI.result: 部分推广了Orlov的结果到奇异簇，将文献中的许多结果强化到任意域，为DVR上的射影平坦概形等算术几何背景中的纤维化和奇异性提供新见解。
AI.conclusion: 该研究发展了积分变换在基变换下的理论框架，为导出等价测试提供了更一般的方法，在奇异簇和算术几何背景下具有重要应用价值。

title: L-equivalences via Symplectic and $F_4$ Grassmannians
summary: Using a construction of Kanemitsu from [9] and observations by Rampazzo in [19], we find examples of zero divisors in the Grothendieck ring of varieties by taking the zero loci of sections of vector bundles over symplectic and $F_4$ Grassmannians. These zero divisors yield instances of non-trivially L-equivalent Calabi-Yau varieties. This methodology is inspired by a similar process performed by Ito et al. on $G_2$ Grassmannians in [8].

AI.tldr: 在格罗滕迪克环中通过向量丛截面零点构造零除子，得到非平凡L等价的Calabi-Yau簇实例
AI.motivation: 寻找格罗滕迪克环中的零除子实例，构造非平凡L等价的Calabi-Yau簇
AI.method: 利用Kanemitsu的构造和Rampazzo的观察，在辛格拉斯曼流形和F4格拉斯曼流形上，通过向量丛截面的零点构造零除子
AI.result: 得到了格罗滕迪克环中的零除子实例，这些零除子产生了非平凡L等价的Calabi-Yau簇
AI.conclusion: 该方法扩展了Ito等在G2格拉斯曼流形上的工作，为构造L等价Calabi-Yau簇提供了新途径

title: Nonlinear Kalman varieties
summary: We study the locus of square matrices having at least one eigenvector on a prescribed algebraic variety $X$. When $X$ is a linear subspace, this data locus is known as the Kalman variety of $X$ and was studied first by Ottaviani and Sturmfels. Motivated by recent applications to quantum chemistry and optimization, in this work, we focus on nonlinear Kalman varieties, that is, Kalman varieties relative to arbitrary projective varieties $X$. We study the basic invariants of these varieties, such as their dimensions, degrees, and singularities. Furthermore, Ottaviani and Sturmfels provide determinantal equations in the linear case. We generalize their result to Kalman varieties of hypersurfaces by providing a determinantal-like description of their equation.

AI.tldr: 研究矩阵在给定代数簇X上至少有一个特征向量的轨迹，推广线性Kalman簇到非线性情况，研究其维度、次数、奇点等基本不变量，并为超曲面情况提供行列式方程描述。
AI.motivation: 量子化学和优化等应用需求推动，将经典的线性Kalman簇理论推广到任意射影簇X的非线性情况，研究更一般的矩阵特征向量约束问题。
AI.method: 研究非线性Kalman簇的基本代数几何不变量，包括维度、次数和奇点。对于超曲面情况，推广Ottaviani和Sturmfels的行列式方程方法，提供类似行列式的方程描述。
AI.result: 建立了非线性Kalman簇的理论框架，获得了其基本不变量性质。特别对超曲面情况，成功推广了线性情况的行列式方程描述，为更一般的代数簇情况提供了理论基础。
AI.conclusion: 成功将Kalman簇理论从线性子空间推广到任意射影簇，建立了非线性Kalman簇的代数几何理论，为量子化学和优化等应用提供了数学基础。
